Title: Bans the use of employer data information
Summary: Bans the sale of employment data reports without written consumer consent; provides such employment data reports shall include, but not be limited to, payroll and earnings information, hours worked, consumer history and health insurance information.
LawCode: Rel ยง380-v to be ยง380-w, add ยง380-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale and use of employment information
